text: 1. It all started when Tyga performed at Kendall Jenner's Sweet Sixteen Birthday party. It appeared that 14 - year - old Kylie first had something for Tyga when she bumped into him at her sister's sixteenth birthday party. He had been invited to perform at the event back in 2011 and she can be seen awkwardly flirting with Tyga in the corresponding episode of'Keeping Up With The Kardashians '.
